verses.verse: When Jesus<WG2424> had spoken<WG2036> these words,<WG5023> he went out<WG1831> with<WG4862> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> over<WG4008> the brook<WG5493> Kidron,<WG2748> where<WG3699> there was<WG2258> a garden,<WG2779> into<WG1519> which<WG3739> he<WG846> and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> entered.<WG1525>

Now<WG1161> Judas,<WG2455> who<WG3588> betrayed<WG3860> him,<WG846> also<WG2532> knew<WG1492> the place,<WG5117> for<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> often<WG4178> met<WG4863> there<WG1563> with<WG3326> his<WG846> disciples.<WG3101>

Judas<WG2455> then,<WG3767> having taken<WG2983> a detachment<WG4686> of soldiers and<WG2532> officers<WG5257> from<WG1537> the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the Pharisees,<WG5330> came<WG2064> there<WG1563> with<WG3326> lanterns,<WG5322> <WG2532> torches,<WG2985> and<WG2532> weapons.<WG3696>

Jesus<WG2424> therefore,<WG3767> knowing<WG1492> all the things<WG3956> that<WG3588> were happening<WG2064> to<WG1909> him,<WG846> went forth,<WG1831> and said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Who<WG5101> are you looking for?<WG2212>"

They answered<WG611> him,<WG846> "Jesus<WG2424> of Nazareth.<WG3480>" Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "I<WG1473> am<WG1510> he.<WG1161>" Judas<WG2455> also,<WG2532> who<WG3588> betrayed<WG3860> him,<WG846> was standing<WG2476> with<WG3326> them.<WG846>
When<WG5613> therefore<WG3767> he said<WG2036> to them,<WG3754> "I<WG1473> am<WG1510> he,<WG565>" they went <WG1519> backward,<WG3694> and<WG2532> fell<WG4098> to the ground.<WG5476>
Again<WG3825> therefore<WG3767> he<WG1905> asked them,<WG846> "Who<WG5101> are you<WG2212> looking for?<WG1161>" They said,<WG2036> "Jesus<WG2424> of Nazareth.<WG3480>"

Jesus<WG2424> answered,<WG611> "I told<WG2036> you<WG5213> that<WG3754> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> he.<WG1487> If therefore<WG3767> you seek<WG2212> me,<WG1691> let<WG863> these<WG5128> go their way,<WG5217>"

that<WG2443> the word<WG3056> might be fulfilled<WG4137> which<WG3739> he spoke,<WG3754> "Of<WG1537> those<WG846> whom<WG3739> you have given<WG1325> me,<WG3427> I have lost<WG622> <WG3756> none.<WG3762>"

Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> therefore,<WG3767> having<WG2192> a sword,<WG3162> drew<WG1670> it,<WG846> and<WG2532> struck<WG3817> the high priest<WG749>'s servant,<WG1401> and<WG2532> cut off<WG609> his<WG846> right<WG1188> ear.<WG1161> The servant<WG1401>'s name<WG3686> was<WG2258> Malchus.<WG3124>

Jesus<WG2424> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036> to Peter,<WG4074> "Put<WG906> the<WG4675> sword<WG3162> into<WG1519> its sheath.<WG2336> The cup<WG4221> which<WG3739> the<WG3588> Father<WG3962> has given<WG1325> me,<WG3427> shall I<WG846> not<WG3756> <WG3361> surely drink<WG4095> it?<WG846>"
So<WG3767> the detachment,<WG4686> the<WG2532> commanding officer,<WG5506> and<WG2532> the officers<WG5257> of the Jews,<WG2453> seized<WG4815> Jesus<WG2424> and<WG2532> bound<WG1210> him,<WG846>

and<WG2532> led<WG520> him<WG846><WG99999> to<WG4314> Annas<WG452> first,<WG4412> for<WG1063> he was<WG2258> father-in<WG3995>-law to Caiaphas,<WG2533> who<WG3739> was<WG2258> high priest<WG749> that<WG1565> year.<WG1763>

Now<WG1161> it was<WG2258> Caiaphas<WG2533> who<WG3588> advised<WG4823> the Jews<WG2453> that<WG3754> it was expedient that<WG4851> one<WG1520> man<WG444> should perish<WG622> for<WG5228> the people.<WG2992>

<WG1161> Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> followed<WG190> Jesus,<WG2424> as<WG2532> did another<WG243> disciple.<WG3101> Now<WG1161> that<WG1565> disciple<WG3101> was<WG2258> known<WG1110> to the high priest,<WG749> and<WG2532> entered in with<WG4897> Jesus<WG2424> into<WG1519> the court<WG833> of the high priest;<WG749>

but<WG1161> Peter<WG4074> was standing<WG2476> at<WG4314> the door<WG2374> outside.<WG1854> So<WG3767> the<WG3588> other<WG243> disciple,<WG3101> who<WG3588> was<WG2258> known<WG1110> to the high priest,<WG749> went out<WG1831> and<WG2532> spoke<WG2036> to her who kept the door,<WG2377> and<WG2532> brought in<WG1521> Peter.<WG4074>

Then<WG3767> the maid<WG3814> who<WG1565> kept the door<WG2377> said<WG3004> to Peter,<WG4074> "Are<WG1488> <WG3361> you<WG4771> also<WG2532> one of<WG1537> this<WG5127> man<WG444>'s disciples?<WG3101>" He said,<WG3004> "I am<WG1510> not.<WG3756>"

Now<WG1161> the servants<WG1401> and<WG2532> the officers<WG5257> were standing there,<WG2476> having made<WG4160> a fire of coals,<WG439> for<WG3754> it was<WG2258> cold.<WG5592> They<WG2532> were warming themselves.<WG2328> <WG1161> Peter<WG4074> <WG2258> was with<WG3326> them,<WG846> standing<WG2476> and<WG2532> warming himself.<WG2328>
The high priest<WG749> therefore<WG3767> asked<WG2065> Jesus<WG2424> about<WG4012> his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> and<WG2532> about<WG4012> his<WG846> teaching.<WG1322>

Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> him,<WG846> "I<WG1473> spoke<WG2980> openly<WG3954> to the world.<WG2889> I<WG1473> always<WG3842> taught<WG1321> in<WG1722> synagogues,<WG4864> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the temple,<WG2411> where<WG3699> the Jews<WG2453> always<WG3842> meet.<WG4905> <WG2532> I said<WG2980> nothing<WG3762> in<WG1722> secret.<WG2927>

Why<WG5101> do you<WG1905> ask me?<WG3165> Ask<WG1905> those who<WG3588> have heard me<WG191> what<WG5101> I said<WG2980> to them.<WG846> Behold,<WG1492> these<WG3778> know<WG1492> the things<WG3739> which I<WG1473> said.<WG2036>"

When<WG1161> he<WG846> had<WG2036> said<WG2036> this,<WG5023> one<WG1520> of the officers<WG5257> standing by<WG3936> slapped<WG1325> Jesus<WG2424> with his hand,<WG4475> saying,<WG2036> "Do you<WG611> answer the high priest<WG749> like that?<WG3779>"

Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> him,<WG846> "If<WG1487> I have spoken<WG2980> evil,<WG2560> testify<WG3140> of<WG4012> the evil;<WG2556> but<WG1161> if<WG1487> well,<WG2573> why<WG5101> do you<WG1194> beat me?<WG3165>"
Annas<WG452> sent<WG649> him<WG846> bound<WG1210> to<WG4314> Caiaphas,<WG2533> the high priest.<WG749>

Now<WG1161> Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> was<WG2258> standing<WG2476> and<WG2532> warming himself.<WG2328> They said<WG2036> therefore<WG3767> to him,<WG846> "You<WG4771> aren't<WG1488> <WG3361> also<WG2532> one of<WG1537> his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> are you?<WG1565>" He denied<WG720> it,<WG2532> and said,<WG2036> "I am<WG1510> not.<WG3756>"

One<WG1520> of<WG1537> the servants<WG1401> of the high priest,<WG749> being<WG5607> a relative<WG4773> of him whose<WG3739> ear<WG5621> Peter<WG4074> had cut off,<WG609> said,<WG3004> "Didn't<WG1492> <WG3756> I<WG1473> see<WG1492> you<WG4571> in<WG1722> the garden<WG2779> with<WG3326> him?<WG846>"
Peter<WG4074> therefore<WG3767> denied<WG720> it again,<WG3825> and<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> the rooster<WG220> crowed.<WG5455>

They<WG71> led Jesus<WG2424> therefore<WG3767> from<WG575> Caiaphas<WG2533> into<WG1519> the Praetorium.<WG4232> It<WG1161> was<WG2258> early,<WG4405> and<WG1161> they<WG1525> themselves<WG846> didn't<WG3756> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the Praetorium,<WG4232> that they might<WG2443> not<WG3361> be defiled,<WG3392> but<WG235> might<WG2443> eat<WG5315> the Passover.<WG3957>
Pilate<WG4091> therefore<WG3767> went out<WG1831> to<WG4314> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> "What<WG5101> accusation<WG2724> do you<WG5342> bring against<WG2596> this<WG5127> man?<WG444>"

They answered<WG611> him,<WG846> <WG2532> "If<WG1487> this man<WG3778> weren't<WG2258> <WG3361> an evildoer,<WG2555> we wouldn't<WG3860> <WG3756> have<WG302> delivered<WG3860> him<WG846> up to you.<WG4671>"

Pilate<WG4091> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Take<WG2983> him<WG846> yourselves,<WG5210> and<WG2532> judge<WG2919> him<WG846> according to<WG2596> your<WG5216> law.<WG3551>" Therefore<WG3767> the Jews<WG2453> said to<WG2036> him,<WG846> "It is<WG1832> not<WG3756> lawful for us<WG2254> to put<WG615> anyone<WG3762> to death,<WG615>"
that<WG2443> the word<WG3056> of Jesus<WG2424> might be fulfilled,<WG4137> which<WG3739> he spoke,<WG2036> signifying<WG4591> by what<WG4169> kind of death<WG2288> he should<WG3195> die.<WG599>

Pilate<WG4091> therefore<WG3767> entered<WG1525> again<WG3825> into<WG1519> the Praetorium,<WG4232> <WG2532> called<WG5455> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "Are<WG1488> you<WG4771> the King<WG935> of the Jews?<WG2453>"
Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> him,<WG846> "Do you<WG4771> say<WG3004> this<WG5124> by<WG575> yourself,<WG1438> or<WG2228> did others<WG243> tell<WG2036> you<WG4671> about<WG4012> me?<WG1700>"

Pilate<WG4091> answered,<WG3385> "I<WG2453>'m not a Jew, am<WG1510> I?<WG1473> Your own<WG4674> nation<WG1484> and<WG2532> the chief priests<WG749> delivered<WG3860> you<WG4571> to me.<WG1698> What<WG5101> have you done?<WG4160>"

Jesus<WG2424> answered,<WG611> "My<WG1699> Kingdom<WG932> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> this<WG5127> world.<WG2889> If<WG1487> my<WG1699> Kingdom<WG932> were<WG2258> of<WG1537> this<WG5127> world,<WG2889> then my<WG1698> servants<WG5257> would<WG302> fight,<WG75> that<WG2443> I wouldn't<WG3860> <WG3361> be delivered<WG3860> to the Jews.<WG2453> But<WG1161> now<WG3568> my<WG1699> Kingdom<WG932> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> from here.<WG1782>"

Pilate<WG4091> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "Are<WG1488> you<WG4771> a king<WG935> then?<WG3766>" Jesus<WG2424> answered,<WG611> "You<WG4771> say<WG3004> that<WG3754> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> a king.<WG935> For<WG1519> this reason<WG5124> I<WG1473> have been<WG1080> born,<WG1080> and<WG2532> for<WG1519> this reason<WG5124> I<WG2064> have come into<WG1519> the world,<WG2889> that<WG2443> I should testify<WG3140> to the truth.<WG225> Everyone<WG3956> who is<WG5607> of<WG1537> the truth<WG225> listens<WG191> to my<WG3450> voice.<WG5456>"

Pilate<WG4091> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "What<WG5101> is<WG2076> truth?<WG225>" When he had said<WG2036> this,<WG5124> he went out<WG1831> again<WG3825> to<WG4314> the Jews,<WG2453> and<WG2532> said<WG3004> to<WG4314> them,<WG846> "I<WG1473> find<WG2147> no<WG3762> basis for a charge<WG156> against<WG1722> him.<WG846>

But<WG1161> you have<WG2076> a custom,<WG4914> that<WG2443> I should release<WG630> someone<WG1520> to<WG5213> you<WG5213> at<WG1722> the Passover.<WG3957> Therefore<WG3767> do you<WG1014> want me to release<WG630> to you<WG5213> the King<WG935> of the Jews?<WG2453>"
Then<WG3767> they<WG2905> all<WG3956> shouted again,<WG3825> saying,<WG3004> "Not<WG3361> this man,<WG5126> but<WG235> Barabbas!<WG912>" Now<WG1161> Barabbas<WG912> was<WG2258> a robber.<WG3027>
